Name: David Baltimore
Citation: for their discoveries concerning the interaction between tumour viruses and the genetic material of the cell

Name: Robert Engle
Citation: for methods of analyzing economic time series with time-varying volatility ( ARCH )

Name: Daniel L. McFadden
Citation: for his development of theory and methods for analyzing discrete choice

Name: John Forbes Nash , Jr
Citation: for [ his ] pioneering analysis of equilibria in the theory of non-cooperative games

Name: Myron S. Scholes
Citation: for a new method to determine the value of derivatives

Name: K. Barry Sharpless
Citation: for his work on chirally catalysed oxidation reactions

Name: Charles H. Townes
Citation: for fundamental work in the field of quantum electronics , which has led to the construction of oscillators and amplifiers based on the maser-laser principle

Name: Steven Weinberg
Citation: for their contributions to the theory of the unified weak and electromagnetic interaction between elementary particles , including , inter alia , the prediction of the weak neutral current
